about.name: Zoey Cheng
about.title: Web Developer
intro: With over 2 years of experience as a front-end developer, I have a deep understanding of Vue.js and related technologies such as Option API, Vuex, and Vuetify, as well as back-end development experience with ASP.NET MVC and Blazor.
I have led cross-departmental projects and am capable of independently completing projects and delivering work on time.

I am passionate about learning new technologies and am currently expanding my knowledge in front-end technologies like React and Node.js, with the goal of becoming a versatile developer with the ability to choose technologies and master tools effectively.

master.major: Master of Science in Information Systems, Financial Services and Fintech Micro-credentials
